docs.title: Polyglot Platform Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome to the official documentation of Polyglot Platform.

This site provides architectural overview, runtime concepts, and build-time tooling documentation for the platform.

docs.title: Platform Overview
docs.text: Polyglot Platform is structured into two independent layers:

docs.title: Runtime (JDK 25)
docs.text:
Responsible for:

  • GraalVM context management
  • Script execution
  • Value mapping
  • Spring Boot integration

docs.title: Tooling (JDK 21)
docs.text:
Responsible for:

  • Contract model definition
  • Deterministic interface generation
  • Maven build integration

docs.title: Current Status
docs.text:
Documentation is being actively expanded.

docs.title: Contract Model
docs.text:
The contract model defines a language-agnostic representation of polyglot functions and types.

Specification details are being finalized.

docs.title: Runtime Layer
docs.text:
The runtime layer provides execution abstraction over GraalVM Polyglot.

Documentation of execution model, lifecycle management, and integration patterns is in progress.

docs.title: Tooling Layer
docs.text:
